mapper.insert: insert into transaction values(seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption:CHAR}, #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{divyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{divyRequest:VARCHAR}, #{tranCode}, SYSDATE, #{divyDate}, #{sEA}, nvl(#{cancelCode},0))
mapper.select: SELECT t.tran_no, p.prod_no,p.price, u.user_Id, t.payment_option, u.user_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr , t.dlvy_request, t.tran_status_code, t.order_data, TO_CHAR(t.dlvy_date,'yyyyMMdd') dlvy_date,t.sea , t.cancel_code FROM transaction t , product p ,users u WHERE tran_no= #{tranNo} and t.prod_no=p.prod_no(+) and t.buyer_id=u.user_Id ORDER BY tran_no DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( select t.buyer_id ,t.receiver_name,t.receiver_phone,t.tran_status_code,t.tran_no, p.prod_Name,p.prod_no,p.price,p.IMAGE_FILE,t.sea, t.cancel_code from transaction t,product p where BUyer_id= #{buyerId} and t.prod_no = p.prod_no(+) ORDER BY tran_no DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( select buyer_id ,receiver_name,receiver_phone,tran_status_code,tran_no,prod_no,sea from transaction where BUyer_id= #{buyerId}) countTable
mapper.update: update transaction set cancel_code=#{cancelCode} where tran_no=#{tranNo}
mapper.select: select u.user_Id, p.prod_name, p.prod_no, p.price, t.sea, t.cancel_Code, t.tran_No from users u, product p, transaction t where t.prod_no=p.prod_No(+) and t.buyer_id = u.user_id(+) and t.cancel_code > 0 order by t.cancel_code

select u.user_Id, p.prod_name, p.price, p.IMAGE_FILE, p.prod_no, t.sea, t.cancel_Code, t.TRAN_STATUS_CODE, t.tran_No from users u, product p, transaction t where t.prod_no=p.prod_No(+) and t.buyer_id = u.user_id(+)
and u.user_Id Like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and p.prod_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
order by t.cancel_code

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( select buyer_id ,receiver_name,receiver_phone,tran_status_code,tran_no,prod_no,sea from transaction
where cancel_code = 0
where cancel_code not in(0)
) countTable
